directory_details.src/: Main application source code organized in layers
directory_details.src/bot/: Telegram bot presentation layer - handles user interactions
directory_details.src/bot/handlers/: Specific Telegram conversation and command handlers
directory_details.src/models/: Domain models with Pydantic validation and Airtable integration
directory_details.src/services/: Business logic layer - core application functionality
directory_details.src/data/: Data access layer with repository pattern implementation
directory_details.src/data/repositories/: Abstract repository interfaces for data layer abstraction
directory_details.src/utils/: Common utility functions shared across the application
directory_details.tests/: Comprehensive test suite with clear separation of concerns
directory_details.tests/unit/: Unit tests that mirror the src/ directory structure
directory_details.tests/integration/: End-to-end integration tests for complete workflows
directory_details.tests/fixtures/: Shared test data and mock objects
directory_details.docs/: Comprehensive project documentation including architecture and business requirements
directory_details.tasks/: Development task tracking with markdown files for each feature/bug
directory_details..claude/: Claude Code configuration and automation hooks

key_files.src/main.py: Application entry point - initializes bot, loads config, starts polling
key_files.src/models/participant.py: Core domain model with all participant fields, enums, and Airtable mapping
key_files.src/services/search_service.py: Advanced fuzzy search with Russian/English language detection
key_files.src/data/airtable/airtable_client.py: Low-level Airtable API client with rate limiting and error handling
key_files.src/data/airtable/airtable_participant_r: Repository implementation for participant CRUD operations
key_files.src/bot/handlers/search_conversation.py: Main conversation flow for participant search functionality
key_files.src/config/settings.py: Centralized configuration using Pydantic settings with environment variables
key_files.src/config/field_mappings.py: Maps internal field names to Airtable field IDs
key_files.tests/conftest.py: Pytest configuration with fixtures and test setup
key_files.CLAUDE.md: Comprehensive guidance for Claude Code on project patterns and commands
key_files.start_bot.sh: Production-ready bot startup script with environment validation

architecture_patterns.error_handling: Structured logging with custom exception hierarchy
architecture_patterns.data_validation: Pydantic models with enum validation and custom validators
architecture_patterns.repository_pattern: Abstract repository interface with Airtable implementation
architecture_patterns.rate_limiting: Built into Airtable client (5 requests/second default)

multilingual_search.description: Russian/English name search with automatic language detection
